alert: ⚠️ Unidentified Individual Detected Inside Student Dormitory
recommended_action: Dispatch officer to the Student Dormitory to identify the individual and verify their authorization to be on the premises.
explanation: An unidentified person was detected inside a sensitive location (Student Dormitory) where privacy and safety are paramount. The system could not verify their identity, and the sound of a closing door suggests entry/exit. A check is required to rule out unauthorized access or a potential threat to residents.
risk_factors: Presence of an unknown individual in a private residential area
Potential for unauthorized access, theft, or threat to student safety
Failure to identify the person via facial recognition

source_event.description: Detected: 1 person. in Student Residence Hall
